Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1969...
Injured on 4/16/1971 with a Bruised Neck, out for 3 days...
Had first career hit on 6/2/1971, off Dave Bennett (OAK)...
Hit first career homerun on 6/4/1971, off Bill Singer (BOS)...
Injured on 6/20/1972 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Hit for the cycle against California on 4/1/1973...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Texas on 5/7/1973...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Hit for the cycle against Oakland on 7/12/1973...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (A) on 4/11/1980...
Traded from Baltimore to Texas on 7/31/1983 (Going to TEX: 3B M. Arito. Going to BAL: SS R. Quinones)...
